actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: Concurrent resolution toward a barrier-free environment for all handicapped Americans.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that there shall be a national policy recognizing the right of all citizens to the full development of their economic, social and personal potential regardless of their physical disabilities. Directs that there be a mobilization of private and public resources to remove barriers from the environment. Expresses as a goal the integration of handicapped people into their communities.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution toward a barrier-free environment for all handicapped Americans.
